description:
The Heart Pirates head for the bottom of the ocean as Trafalgar Law prepares to operate on Luffy and Jimbei. Meanwhile, the arrival of Shanks brings the bloodshed to a sudden halt!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here Comes Shanks! The War of the Best Is Finally Over!
Shanks Kenzan! Choujou Sensou Tsui ni Shuuketsu
Shanks apparaît ! La guerre au sommet se termine enfin
Появление Шанкса! Долгожданный конец Великой войны
ها هو ذا شانكس! حرب القمّة تنتهي أخيرًا!
シャンクス見参! 頂上戦争ついに終結
